author: dlydick
msg: Rebuilt to handle many sizes of block allocation requests, which
are assigned to a block with the best fit.  Should probably rename,
but still can allocate single blocks from the heap if request is
too large, just like original code.
Added display of allocation statistics at heap shutdown time.

author: dlydick
msg: Use macro JVMCFG_OVERRIDE_HEAP_TYPE to define a default heap
Use macro CONFIG_HEAP_TYPE to declare this heap type.  Set it to

author: dlydick
msg: Added suite of OO evaluation functions.
